languages.text: "Мне не нужен этот корабль, а вот металлолом с него пригодится. У меня есть знакомые умельцы-пустотники, которые разберут судно до последнего винтика — передайте им "Бессердечного".

"I have no need for the ship itself, but the scrap obtained from it could be put to good use. I know some capable voidfarers who will take the Heartless apart down to the last screw — deliver the ship to them."
languages.original_text: "Мне не нужен этот корабль, а вот металлолом с него пригодится. У меня есть знакомые умельцы-пустотники, которые разберут судно до последнего винтика — передайте им "Бессердечного".

traits.locale_text: "I have no need for the ship itself, but the scrap obtained from it could be put to good use. I know some capable voidfarers who will take the Heartless apart down to the last screw — deliver the ship to them."

"I have no need for the ship itself, but the scrap obtained from it could be put to good use. I know some capable voidsmen who will take the Heartless apart down to the last screw — deliver the ship to them."

"I have no need for the ship itself, but the scrap obtained from it could be put to good use. I know some capable voidfarers who will take the Heartless apart down to the last screw — deliver the ship to them."

"I have no need for the ship itself, but the scrap obtained from it could be put to good use. I know some capable voidfarers who will take the Heartless apart down to the last screw — deliver the ship to them."

"I have no need for the ship itself, but the scrap obtained from it could be put to good use. I know some capable voidfarers who will take the Heartless apart down to the last screw — deliver the ship to them."

languages.text: “我不需要这艘船，但从船上拆下来的废料能派上大用场。我认识一群很有能耐的家伙，他们可以把无心号彻底拆掉，把这艘船交给那些人负责吧。”
languages.original_text: "I have no need for the ship itself, but the scrap obtained from it could be put to good use. I know some capable voidfarers who will take the Heartless apart down to the last screw — deliver the ship to them."

traits.locale_text: “我不需要这艘船，但从船上拆下来的废料能派上大用场。我认识一群很有能耐的家伙，他们可以把无心号彻底拆掉，把这艘船交给那些人负责吧。”

languages.text: 「船そのものは必要ないが、そこから得られるスクラップは有効に活用できる。ハートレスを最後のネジ一本まで解体できる腕のいい虚空渡りたちを知っている。彼らのもとへその船を届けてくれ」
languages.original_text: "I have no need for the ship itself, but the scrap obtained from it could be put to good use. I know some capable voidfarers who will take the Heartless apart down to the last screw — deliver the ship to them."

traits.locale_text: 「船そのものは必要ないが、そこから得られるスクラップは有効に活用できる。ハートレスを最後のネジ一本まで解体できる腕のいい虚空渡りたちを知っている。彼らのもとへその船を届けてくれ」

languages.text: «No necesito la nave, pero podemos aprovechar la chatarra que nos proporcionará. Conozco a unos viajeros del vacío expertos que pueden desmantelar la Desalmada hasta el último tornillo; envíeles la nave».
languages.original_text: "I have no need for the ship itself, but the scrap obtained from it could be put to good use. I know some capable voidfarers who will take the Heartless apart down to the last screw — deliver the ship to them."

traits.locale_text: «No necesito la nave, pero podemos aprovechar la chatarra que nos proporcionará. Conozco a unos viajeros del vacío expertos que pueden desmantelar la Desalmada hasta el último tornillo; envíeles la nave».

languages.text: "Ich habe keine Verwendung für das Schiff selbst, aber der Metallschrott könnte sich als nützlich erweisen. Ich kenne einige fähige Raumfahrer, die die Heartless bis auf die letzte Schraube zerlegen werden – liefert ihnen das Schiff."
languages.original_text: "I have no need for the ship itself, but the scrap obtained from it could be put to good use. I know some capable voidfarers who will take the Heartless apart down to the last screw — deliver the ship to them."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe keine Verwendung für das Schiff selbst, aber der Metallschrott könnte sich als nützlich erweisen. Ich kenne einige fähige Raumfahrer, die die Heartless bis auf die letzte Schraube zerlegen werden – liefert ihnen das Schiff."

languages.text: "Geminin kendisine ihtiyacım yok ancak gemiden elde edilen parçalar işe yarayabilir. Taşkalp'i son vidasına kadar sökebilecek becerikli gemiciler tanıyorum. Gemiyi onlara götürün."
languages.original_text: "I have no need for the ship itself, but the scrap obtained from it could be put to good use. I know some capable voidfarers who will take the Heartless apart down to the last screw — deliver the ship to them."

traits.locale_text: "Geminin kendisine ihtiyacım yok ancak gemiden elde edilen parçalar işe yarayabilir. Taşkalp'i son vidasına kadar sökebilecek becerikli gemiciler tanıyorum. Gemiyi onlara götürün."

languages.text: « Ce vaisseau ne me sera d'aucune utilité, mais les matériaux issus de son démantèlement pourraient bien me servir. Je connais des voyageurs stellaires qui pourront complètement démanteler le Sans-Cœur. Confiez-leur le vaisseau. »
languages.original_text: "I have no need for the ship itself, but the scrap obtained from it could be put to good use. I know some capable voidfarers who will take the Heartless apart down to the last screw — deliver the ship to them."

traits.locale_text: « Ce vaisseau ne me sera d'aucune utilité, mais les matériaux issus de son démantèlement pourraient bien me servir. Je connais des voyageurs stellaires qui pourront complètement démanteler le Sans-Cœur. Confiez-leur le vaisseau. »
